author: Lisa Faulkner
method: Crush the garlic with a little salt in a pestle and mortar to make a paste.  Add the yoghurt and lemon juice and stir well. Stir through the mint. Set aside until needed.
ingredients: 2 garlic cloves,  salt, to taste,  300g/10oz natural yoghurt,  1 lemon, juice only,  small handful mint leaves, chopped
